properties.description: The properties of a configure alert request.

sku.description: Identifies the unique system identifier for each Azure resource.

agentAutoUpdateStatus.description: A value indicating whether the auto update is enabled.

automationAccountAuthenticationType.description: A value indicating the type authentication to use for automation Account.

agentAutoUpdateStatus.description: A value indicating whether the auto update is enabled.

automationAccountAuthenticationType.description: A value indicating the authentication type for automation account. The default value is "RunAsAccount".

autoProtectionOfDataDisk.description: A value indicating whether the auto protection is enabled.

diskEncryptionInfo.description: The recovery disk encryption information (for two pass flows).

fabricObjectId.description: The fabric specific object Id of the virtual machine.

primaryLocation.description: The primary location for the virtual machine.

primaryStagingStorageAccountCustomInput.description: The primary staging storage account input.

recoveryAvailabilityType.description: The recovery availability type of the virtual machine.

recoveryLocation.description: The recovery location for the virtual machine.

recoveryProximityPlacementGroupCustomInp.description: The recovery proximity placement group custom input.

recoveryResourceGroupId.description: The recovery resource group Id. Valid for V2 scenarios.

recoverySubscriptionId.description: The recovery subscription Id of the virtual machine.

vmDisks.description: The list of vm disk inputs.

vmManagedDisks.description: The list of vm managed disk inputs.

fabricObjectId.description: The fabric specific object Id of the virtual machine.

diskEncryptionInfo.description: The recovery disk encryption information (for two pass flows).

fabricObjectId.description: The fabric specific object Id of the virtual machine.

recoveryAzureNetworkId.description: The recovery Azure virtual network ARM id.

recoveryCapacityReservationGroupId.description: The recovery capacity reservation group Id.

recoveryCloudServiceId.description: The recovery cloud service Id. Valid for V1 scenarios.

recoveryProximityPlacementGroupId.description: The recovery proximity placement group Id.

recoveryResourceGroupId.description: The recovery resource group Id. Valid for V2 scenarios.

recoveryVirtualMachineScaleSetId.description: The virtual machine scale set Id.

vmDisks.description: The list of vm disk details.

vmManagedDisks.description: The list of vm managed disk details.

appConsistentFrequencyInMinutes.description: The app consistent snapshot frequency (in minutes).

crashConsistentFrequencyInMinutes.description: The crash consistent snapshot frequency (in minutes).

multiVmSyncStatus.description: A value indicating whether multi-VM sync has to be enabled. Value should be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'.

recoveryPointHistory.description: The duration in minutes until which the recovery points need to be stored.

primaryStagingStorageAccountCustomInput.description: The primary staging storage account input.

recoveryAzureStorageAccountCustomInput.description: The recovery VHD storage account input.

diskEncryptionInfo.description: The recovery disk encryption information (for one / single pass flows).

primaryStagingStorageAccountCustomInput.description: The primary staging storage account input.

recoveryDiskEncryptionSetId.description: The recovery disk encryption set Id.

recoveryReplicaDiskAccountType.description: The replica disk type. Its an optional value and will be same as source disk type if not user provided.

recoveryTargetDiskAccountType.description: The target disk type after failover. Its an optional value and will be same as source disk type if not user provided.

primaryStagingAzureStorageAccountId.description: The primary staging storage account Id.

recoveryAzureStorageAccountId.description: The recovery VHD storage account Id.

diskEncryptionInfo.description: The recovery disk encryption information (for one / single pass flows).

primaryStagingAzureStorageAccountId.description: The primary staging storage account Arm Id.

recoveryDiskEncryptionSetId.description: The recovery disk encryption set Id.

recoveryReplicaDiskAccountType.description: The replica disk type. Its an optional value and will be same as source disk type if not user provided.

recoveryResourceGroupId.description: The target resource group Arm Id.

recoveryTargetDiskAccountType.description: The target disk type after failover. Its an optional value and will be same as source disk type if not user provided.

authenticationIdentityInput.description: The identity provider input for DRA authentication.

biosId.description: The Bios Id of the machine.

dataPlaneAuthenticationIdentityInput.description: The identity provider input for data plane authentication.

machineId.description: The Id of the machine where the provider is getting added.

machineName.description: The name of the machine where the provider is getting added.

resourceAccessIdentityInput.description: The identity provider input for resource access.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name of the vCenter.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the vCenter to be discovered.

processServerId.description: The process server Id from where the discovery is orchestrated.

runAsAccountId.description: The account Id which has privileges to discover the vCenter.

userAssignedIdentity.description: The user assigned identity to be used to grant permissions in case the type of identity used is UserAssigned

useSystemAssignedIdentity.description: Indicate that system assigned identity should be used. Mutually exclusive with 'userAssignedIdentity' field

keyUri.description: The key uri of the Customer Managed Key

customEmailAddresses.description: The custom email address for sending emails.

locale.description: The locale for the email notification.

sendToOwners.description: A value indicating whether to send email to subscription administrator.

providerSpecificInput.description: Provider specific inputs for container creation.

targetProtectionContainerId.description: The target unique protection container name.

providerSpecificDetails.description: The ReplicationProviderInput. For A2A provider, it will be A2ACreateProtectionIntentInput object.

diskEncryptionKeyInfo.description: The recovery KeyVault reference for secret.

keyEncryptionKeyInfo.description: The recovery KeyVault reference for key.

keyVaultResourceArmId.description: The KeyVault resource ARM id for secret.

providerSpecificDetails.description: The ReplicationProviderInput. For HyperVReplicaAzure provider, it will be AzureEnableProtectionInput object. For San provider, it will be SanEnableProtectionInput object. For HyperVReplicaAzure provider, it can be null.

protectionProfileId.description: The protection profile Arm Id. Throw error, if resource does not exists.

recoveryAvailabilitySetId.description: The recovery availability set Id. Will throw error, if resource does not exist.

recoveryProximityPlacementGroupId.description: The recovery proximity placement group Id. Will throw error, if resource does not exist.

recoveryResourceGroupId.description: The recovery resource group Id. Valid for V2 scenarios.

recoveryVirtualNetworkId.description: The recovery virtual network Id. Will throw error, if resource does not exist.

azureStorageAccountId.description: The storage account Arm Id. Throw error, if resource does not exists.

name.description: The name of the extended location.

disksToInclude.description: The list of VHD Ids of disks to be protected.

disksToIncludeForManagedDisks.description: The disks to include list for managed disks.

enableRdpOnTargetOption.description: The selected option to enable RDP\SSH on target vm after failover. String value of SrsDataContract.EnableRDPOnTargetOption enum.

logStorageAccountId.description: The storage account to be used for logging during replication.

osType.description: The OS type associated with VM.

seedManagedDiskTags.description: The tags for the seed managed disks.

targetAvailabilitySetId.description: The target availability set ARM Id for resource manager deployment.

targetAzureNetworkId.description: The selected target Azure network Id.

targetAzureSubnetId.description: The selected target Azure subnet Id.

targetAzureV1ResourceGroupId.description: The Id of the target resource group (for classic deployment) in which the failover VM is to be created.

targetAzureV2ResourceGroupId.description: The Id of the target resource group (for resource manager deployment) in which the failover VM is to be created.

targetManagedDiskTags.description: The tags for the target managed disks.

targetNicTags.description: The tags for the target NICs.

targetProximityPlacementGroupId.description: The proximity placement group ARM Id.

useManagedDisks.description: A value indicating whether managed disks should be used during failover.

useManagedDisksForReplication.description: A value indicating whether managed disks should be used during replication.

vhdId.description: The OS disk VHD id associated with VM.

applicationConsistentSnapshotFrequencyIn.description: The interval (in hours) at which Hyper-V Replica should create an application consistent snapshot within the VM.

onlineReplicationStartTime.description: The scheduled start time for the initial replication. If this parameter is Null, the initial replication starts immediately.

recoveryPointHistoryDuration.description: The duration (in hours) to which point the recovery history needs to be maintained.

storageAccounts.description: The list of storage accounts to which the VMs in the primary cloud can replicate to.

allowedAuthenticationType.description: A value indicating the authentication type.

applicationConsistentSnapshotFrequencyIn.description: A value indicating the application consistent frequency.

compression.description: A value indicating whether compression has to be enabled.

initialReplicationMethod.description: A value indicating whether IR is online.

offlineReplicationExportPath.description: A value indicating the offline IR export path.

offlineReplicationImportPath.description: A value indicating the offline IR import path.

onlineReplicationStartTime.description: A value indicating the online IR start time.

recoveryPoints.description: A value indicating the number of recovery points.

replicaDeletion.description: A value indicating whether the VM has to be auto deleted.

replicationFrequencyInSeconds.description: A value indicating the replication interval.

replicationPort.description: A value indicating the recovery HTTPS port.

type.description: The type of managed identity used. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user-assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove any identities.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user-assigned identities associated with the resource. The user-assigned identity dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

aadAuthority.description: The base authority for Azure Active Directory authentication.

applicationId.description: The application/client Id for the service principal with which the on-premise management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.

audience.description: The intended Audience of the service principal with which the on-premise management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.

objectId.description: The object Id of the service principal with which the on-premise management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.

tenantId.description: The tenant Id for the service principal with which the on-premise management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.

enableRdpOnTargetOption.description: The selected option to enable RDP\SSH on target VM after failover. String value of SrsDataContract.EnableRDPOnTargetOption enum.

targetAzureV2ResourceGroupId.description: The Id of the target resource group (for resource manager deployment) in which the failover VM is to be created.

retentionDrive.description: The retention drive to use on the MT.

onlyExcludeIfSingleVolume.description: The value indicating whether to exclude multi volume disk or not. If a disk has multiple volumes and one of the volume has label matching with VolumeLabel this disk will be excluded from replication if OnlyExcludeIfSingleVolume is false.
